recipesJson.name: Thot Destroyer (Vapors Tongue)
recipesJson.author: Germ
recipesJson.description:
BANISH YOUR VAPORS TONGUE TO THE SHADOW REALM WITH THIS KICK IN THE SENSES OF EXTREME MINT CHOCOLATE.
I PERSONALLY LIKE IT FRESHLY MADE CAUSE THAT MINT BE HITTIN HARDER. 



This is what I vape when I have vapors tongue and have trouble tasting things.
Make sure to drink plenty of water.
